energy.usef.core.repository

Class BaseRepository<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.repository.BaseRepository<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - entity class type managed by this repository

SynchronisationConnectionRepository, SynchronisationConnectionRepository, SynchronisationConnectionRepository, SynchronisationConnectionStatusRepository, SynchronisationConnectionStatusRepository, UdiEventRepository, UdiRepository

    public abstract class BaseRepository<T>
extends Object
    Base repository class. This class implements basic repository functionality. All specific repository classes should extend this class.
